query.value: SELECT * FROM tas:document where cmis:name = 'testc.txt'
SELECT * FROM tas:document where cmis:name <> 'testc.txt'
SELECT * FROM tas:document where cmis:name < 'testc.txt'
SELECT * FROM tas:document where cmis:name <= 'testc.txt'
SELECT * FROM tas:document where cmis:name > 'testc.txt'
SELECT * FROM tas:document where cmis:name >= 'testc.txt'
SELECT * FROM tas:document where cmis:name IN('testc.txt', 'guestc.txt', 'restc.txt')
SELECT * FROM tas:document where cmis:name NOT IN('testc.txt', 'gustc.txt', 'restc.txt')
SELECT * FROM tas:document where cmis:name LIKE '%testc%'
SELECT * FROM tas:document where cmis:name LIKE 'testc.txt'
SELECT * FROM tas:document where cmis:name LIKE 't%tc.txt'
SELECT * FROM tas:document where cmis:name LIKE 't__tc.txt'
SELECT * FROM tas:folder where cmis:name = 'testf'
SELECT * FROM tas:folder where cmis:name <> 'testf'
SELECT * FROM tas:folder where cmis:name < 'testf'
SELECT * FROM tas:folder where cmis:name <= 'testf'
SELECT * FROM tas:folder where cmis:name > 'testf'
SELECT * FROM tas:folder where cmis:name >= 'testf'
SELECT * FROM tas:folder where cmis:name IN('testf', 'guestf', 'restf')
SELECT * FROM tas:folder where cmis:name NOT IN('testf', 'gustf', 'restf')
SELECT * FROM tas:folder where cmis:name LIKE '%testf%'

SELECT * FROM tas:folder where cmis:name LIKE 't__tf'

SELECT * FROM tas:document where cmis:name LIKE '%testc%' ORDER BY cmis:name DESC, cmis:creationDate ASC
